name: Alien Poacher
description:
What if we had an indie Monster Hunter, in space?!?!

Control a poacher robot from the comfort of your seat and capture as many monsters as possbile before the police, or something bigger, gets you!

2147. Space travel is now a reality, and people are more and more curious about new world and new alien species. You’re a poacher and your objective is to sell monsters or their parts to the black market. Use a salvaged Police bot modded for poaching purposes! But be careful, space poaching is an illegal activity, and the authorities won’t let you do this undisturbed. 

Can you complete the main mission of this Prototype?

Leave a comment below about your experience !
